ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and by the warners crying warning,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And those who restrain by reprimanding,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: by those who drive away the devil (to protect Our revelation),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And by oath of those who herd with a stern warning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: By those who drive the clouds in a good way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Then those who drive away with reproof,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And those who drive away (the wicked) with reproof
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: and those who drive away [the wicked] with reproof
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: by the ones who drive [the clouds] vigorously,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And so are strong in repelling (evil),
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: By those (angels) who drive the clouds in a good way.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [37:2] and the drivers who drive [away], the angels who drive the clouds;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And those who drive away with reproof) He also swore by the angels who drive away the clouds and bring them together.
